item.title: Kindle Keyboard (3rd Generation) - 3.4.3
item.description:
• 3.4.3
  • Your serial number starts with B008 download this file.
  • Your serial number starts with B006 download this file.
  • Your serial number starts with B00A download this file.
Note: If your device is on a version older than 3.4.2, please visit Previous Software Updates for Kindle E-Reader for instructions.

item.title: Kindle DX (2nd Generation) - 2.5.8
item.description:
• 2.5.8
  • Your serial number starts with B004 download this file.
  • After your device has fully updated, download and install the Kindle Services Update.
  • Your serial number starts with B005 download this file.
  • After your device has fully updated, download and install the Kindle Services Update.
  • Your serial number starts with B009 download this file.
  • After your device has fully updated, download and install the Kindle Services Update.


Kindle Website

item.title: Kindle (2nd Generation) - 2.5.8
item.description:
• 2.5.8
  • Your serial number starts with B002 download this file.
  • After your device has fully updated, download and install the Kindle Services Update.
    Note: If you have a software version before 2.3, download and install Software Update 2.3 first, and then complete the steps above.
  • Your serial number starts with B003 download this file.
  • After your device has fully updated, download and install the Kindle Services Update.
    Note: If you have a software version before 2.3, download and install Software Update 2.3 first, and then complete the steps above.
